org.apache.flink.runtime.query

类 KvStateLocationRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.query.KvStateLocationRegistry

  • public class KvStateLocationRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple registry, which maps InternalKvState registration notifications to KvStateLocation instances.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private JobID jobId
      JobID this coordinator belongs to.
      private java.util.Map<JobVertexID,ExecutionJobVertex> jobVertices
      Job vertices for determining parallelism per key.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,KvStateLocation> lookupTable
      Location info keyed by registration name.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      KvStateLocationRegistry(JobID jobId, java.util.Map<JobVertexID,ExecutionJobVertex> jobVertices)
      Creates the registry for the job.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      KvStateLocation getKvStateLocation(java.lang.String registrationName)
      Returns the KvStateLocation for the registered KvState instance or null if no location information is available.
      void notifyKvStateRegistered(JobVertexID jobVertexId, KeyGroupRange keyGroupRange, java.lang.String registrationName, KvStateID kvStateId, java.net.InetSocketAddress kvStateServerAddress)
      Notifies the registry about a registered KvState instance.
      void notifyKvStateUnregistered(JobVertexID jobVertexId, KeyGroupRange keyGroupRange, java.lang.String registrationName)
      Notifies the registry about an unregistered KvState instance.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • jobId

        private final JobID jobId
        JobID this coordinator belongs to.

      • jobVertices

        private final java.util.Map<JobVertexID,ExecutionJobVertex> jobVertices
        Job vertices for determining parallelism per key.

      • lookupTable

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,KvStateLocation> lookupTable
        Location info keyed by registration name. The name needs to be unique per JobID, i.e. two operators cannot register KvState with the same name.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • KvStateLocationRegistry

        public KvStateLocationRegistry(JobID jobId,
                               java.util.Map<JobVertexID,ExecutionJobVertex> jobVertices)
        Creates the registry for the job.
        参数:
        jobId - JobID this coordinator belongs to.
        jobVertices - Job vertices map of all vertices of this job.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getKvStateLocation

        public KvStateLocation getKvStateLocation(java.lang.String registrationName)
        Returns the KvStateLocation for the registered KvState instance or null if no location information is available.
        参数:
        registrationName - Name under which the KvState instance is registered.
        返回:
        Location information or null.

      • notifyKvStateRegistered

        public void notifyKvStateRegistered(JobVertexID jobVertexId,
                                    KeyGroupRange keyGroupRange,
                                    java.lang.String registrationName,
                                    KvStateID kvStateId,
                                    java.net.InetSocketAddress kvStateServerAddress)
        Notifies the registry about a registered KvState instance.
        参数:
        jobVertexId - JobVertexID the KvState instance belongs to
        keyGroupRange - Key group range the KvState instance belongs to
        registrationName - Name under which the KvState has been registered
        kvStateId - ID of the registered KvState instance
        kvStateServerAddress - Server address where to find the KvState instance
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If JobVertexID does not belong to job
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If state has been registered with same name by another operator.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If key group index is out of bounds.

      • notifyKvStateUnregistered

        public void notifyKvStateUnregistered(JobVertexID jobVertexId,
                                      KeyGroupRange keyGroupRange,
                                      java.lang.String registrationName)
        Notifies the registry about an unregistered KvState instance.
        参数:
        jobVertexId - JobVertexID the KvState instance belongs to
        keyGroupRange - Key group index the KvState instance belongs to
        registrationName - Name under which the KvState has been registered
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If another operator registered the state instance
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the registration name is not known
